issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: We have used Titanium.UI.MobileWeb in our project. but now i dont see this API in latest versions like 6.2.2
fields.environment: We have used Titanium.UI.MobileWeb in our project. but now i dont see this API in latest versions like 6.2.2

comments.body: Hello, Mobileweb platform was deprecated long ago. We are no longer providing the support for mobileweb. Starting with  5.4.0 CLI/SDK. You might see the platform logo still in the studio configuration with a yellow warning sign. We will be removing any trace of mobileweb with 7.0.0 release. Thanks.

Hey there! The MobileWeb platform was deprecated in 6.0.0 to focus on our native app development platforms. As there were no changes to MobileWeb since a while before depecating it, you are save to use 6.2.2 to build for MobileWeb, but should use newer Titanium SDK's for your native mobile solutions.
